   contain the root `toctree` directive.

inmydata agent SDK API reference
================================

The inmydata agent SDK enables you to build AI agents that can rapidly access data from the inmydata platform. 
Documentation and support `can be found here <https://developer.inmydata.com>`__

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Modules:

   inmydata.CalendarAssistant
   inmydata.ConversationalData
   inmydata.StructuredData
